What are the components of KBAI
script.response: The course has five components. Video Lessons, Exercises and Readings; Design, Programming and Reflection projects; Assignments and Examinations; Peer Feedback; and Announcements, Question Answering and Discussions.

questions: How many videos do I need to watch
How many videos are there
script.response: This course has 26 videos with about 18 hours of instruction.

questions: Are there exercises
How many exercises
script.response: The videos have ~150 exercises and ~100 “tutors” embedded in them.
